content.infomation:
Regardless of the size of your organization, we believe the fundamental requirements in cybersecurity management are the same, it should be:
Effective and efficient
Fast and easy to deploy
Highly scalable and cost-effective
With Iristelâ€™s iMDR (intelligent Managed Detect & Response), you get:
A comprehensive cybersecurity solution that leverages next-gen AI based technology, backed by 24x7 Iristel Security Operation Center, with minimum-to-zero interference to existing business processesIristel iMDR deploys in days, not weeks or even months.
Simple monthly subscription model, for as little as $23 CAD/endpoint/month, we take care of the entirety of the cybersecurity management.
